title: Cinderella
author: Charles Perrault
description: The classic story of Cinderella, who overcomes her hardships with the help of her fairy godmother and finds happiness with the prince.

title: Snow White
author: The Brothers Grimm
description: The story of Snow White, who, after being poisoned by her stepmother, is saved by the kiss of a prince.

title: Sleeping Beauty
author: Charles Perrault
description: Princess Aurora is cursed to sleep forever but is awakened by a prince's kiss.

title: Beauty and the Beast
author: Jeanne-Marie Leprince de Beaumont
description: Belle, a young woman who sees beyond the Beastâ€™s appearance, teaches him to love and is ultimately loved in return.

title: Rapunzel
author: The Brothers Grimm
description: Rapunzel, a princess locked away in a tower, waits for the prince who will rescue her.

title: The Little Mermaid
author: Hans Christian Andersen
description: Ariel, a mermaid princess, dreams of becoming human to be with the prince she loves.

title: Tangled
author: Disney
description: Rapunzel, a princess with magical hair, escapes from her tower to explore the world and find her destiny.
